includedAssets.title: New Blood
includedAssets.synopsis: The serial killer thriller returns. Joe Carroll may now be on death row, but a series of dark events tear open old wounds for Hardy (Kevin Bacon).
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The serial killer thriller returns. Joe Carroll may now be on death row, but a series of dark events tear open old wounds for Hardy (Kevin Bacon).
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The serial killer thriller returns. Joe Carroll may now be on death row, but a series of dark events tear open old wounds for Hardy (Kevin Bacon).

includedAssets.title: Boxed In
includedAssets.synopsis: As Hardy is thrown into a dangerous situation, facing the truth is the only thing that can set him free. Plus, tension mounts among Mark's group.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Hardy is thrown into a dangerous situation, facing the truth is the only thing that can set him free. Plus, tension mounts among Mark's group.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Hardy is thrown into a dangerous situation, facing the truth is the only thing that can set him free. Plus, tension mounts among Mark's group.

includedAssets.title: Exposed
includedAssets.synopsis: Following a devastating loss, Hardy, Weston and Max set out to hunt down who is responsible, leading Hardy to take a risk with deadly consequences.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Following a devastating loss, Hardy, Weston and Max set out to hunt down who is responsible, leading Hardy to take a risk with deadly consequences.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Following a devastating loss, Hardy, Weston and Max set out to hunt down who is responsible, leading Hardy to take a risk with deadly consequences.

includedAssets.title: Home
includedAssets.synopsis: As Mark, Kyle and Daisy plan an attack on Ryan, the FBI receives a tip that leads them to a secret location.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Mark, Kyle and Daisy plan an attack on Ryan, the FBI receives a tip that leads them to a secret location.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Mark, Kyle and Daisy plan an attack on Ryan, the FBI receives a tip that leads them to a secret location.

includedAssets.title: A Hostile Witness
includedAssets.synopsis: The team split up as they hunt down a missing person and Ryan is forced to enlist the help of a former enemy to defeat a greater one.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The team split up as they hunt down a missing person and Ryan is forced to enlist the help of a former enemy to defeat a greater one.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The team split up as they hunt down a missing person and Ryan is forced to enlist the help of a former enemy to defeat a greater one.

includedAssets.title: Reunion
includedAssets.synopsis: Ryan and Mike follow a tip to a small town where they discover an even greater threat who has managed to avoid suspicion - until now.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: Ryan and Mike follow a tip to a small town where they discover an even greater threat who has managed to avoid suspicion - until now.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: Ryan and Mike follow a tip to a small town where they discover an even greater threat who has managed to avoid suspicion - until now.

includedAssets.title: The Hunt
includedAssets.synopsis: While Ryan and Mike turn their attentions to a new threat, Max comes hair-raisingly close to a deadly menace on her return to work.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Ryan and Mike turn their attentions to a new threat, Max comes hair-raisingly close to a deadly menace on her return to work.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Ryan and Mike turn their attentions to a new threat, Max comes hair-raisingly close to a deadly menace on her return to work.

includedAssets.title: Flesh & Blood
includedAssets.synopsis: When Ryan takes matters into his own hands he finds himself in dangerous territory, while a new threat tries to cover his tracks.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When Ryan takes matters into his own hands he finds himself in dangerous territory, while a new threat tries to cover his tracks.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When Ryan takes matters into his own hands he finds himself in dangerous territory, while a new threat tries to cover his tracks.

includedAssets.title: Kill The Messenger
includedAssets.synopsis: A game of cat-and-mouse leads Ryan back to Joe Carroll. Elsewhere, Max and Mike look for stolen evidence and Mark makes a shocking decision.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: A game of cat-and-mouse leads Ryan back to Joe Carroll. Elsewhere, Max and Mike look for stolen evidence and Mark makes a shocking decision.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: A game of cat-and-mouse leads Ryan back to Joe Carroll. Elsewhere, Max and Mike look for stolen evidence and Mark makes a shocking decision.

includedAssets.title: Evermore
includedAssets.synopsis: As Joe Carroll's execution day arrives, Ryan's fears that he won't go quietly are realised when a hostage situation develops at the prison.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: As Joe Carroll's execution day arrives, Ryan's fears that he won't go quietly are realised when a hostage situation develops at the prison.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: As Joe Carroll's execution day arrives, Ryan's fears that he won't go quietly are realised when a hostage situation develops at the prison.

includedAssets.title: Demons
includedAssets.synopsis: While the team is led to a dangerous serial killer with links to Theo, Ryan falls into a downward spiral in the aftermath of recent events.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While the team is led to a dangerous serial killer with links to Theo, Ryan falls into a downward spiral in the aftermath of recent events.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While the team is led to a dangerous serial killer with links to Theo, Ryan falls into a downward spiral in the aftermath of recent events.

includedAssets.title: The Edge
includedAssets.synopsis: An increasingly reckless Ryan continues his search for Theo, as Mark and Daisy discover information that leads them closer to the FBI and Mike Weston.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: An increasingly reckless Ryan continues his search for Theo, as Mark and Daisy discover information that leads them closer to the FBI and Mike Weston.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: An increasingly reckless Ryan continues his search for Theo, as Mark and Daisy discover information that leads them closer to the FBI and Mike Weston.

includedAssets.title: A Simple Trade
includedAssets.synopsis: When a deadly deal is made, things don't go as planned. And in the aftermath of recent events, Ryan makes a decision about his future.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: When a deadly deal is made, things don't go as planned. And in the aftermath of recent events, Ryan makes a decision about his future.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: When a deadly deal is made, things don't go as planned. And in the aftermath of recent events, Ryan makes a decision about his future.

includedAssets.title: Dead Or Alive
includedAssets.synopsis: In the penultimate episode of the series, the FBI's hunt for Theo continues as the stakes become higher than ever.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: In the penultimate episode of the series, the FBI's hunt for Theo continues as the stakes become higher than ever.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: In the penultimate episode of the series, the FBI's hunt for Theo continues as the stakes become higher than ever.

includedAssets.title: The Reckoning
includedAssets.synopsis: The serial killer thriller concludes as suspicions rise and alliances are shaken, meaning no one is safe.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: The serial killer thriller concludes as suspicions rise and alliances are shaken, meaning no one is safe.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: The serial killer thriller concludes as suspicions rise and alliances are shaken, meaning no one is safe.

includedAssets.title: Season 3
includedAssets.synopsis: While Joe Carroll awaits execution, Ryan, Max and Mike battle a new deadly foe and their followers. Pulsating third season of the psychological horror thriller starring Kevin Bacon, Shawn Ashmore, Jessica Stroup and James Purefoy.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: While Joe awaits execution, Ryan, Max and Mike hunt a new deadly foe. Pulsating third season of the psychological horror thriller with Kevin Bacon.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: While Joe Carroll awaits execution, Ryan, Max and Mike battle a new deadly foe and their followers. Pulsating third season of the psychological horror thriller starring Kevin Bacon, Shawn Ashmore, Jessica Stroup and James Purefoy.

includedIn.title: The Following
includedIn.synopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer and the cult of believers who follow his every command.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: A retired FBI agent attempts to recapture a psychotic serial killer who has created a cult of fanatical followers to spread his message and carry out his deadly plans.
